1.0.name: wordpress/share-pluso
1.0.description: Get more traffic back to your site by installing the Wordpress Pluso plugin Wordpress Pluso is a plugin to add social buttons to the Wordpress site. You can choose from different russian and international social networks and configure the style of buttons. For example, you can change size, color, order, layout of the social network buttons. Our buttons are unobtrusive, quick to load and recognized all over the web.
